refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GObject ╰── AgsThread ├── AgsAudioLoop ├── AgsAutosaveThread ├── AgsExportThread ├── AgsGuiThread ├── AgsIteratorThread ├── AgsRecordThread ├── AgsRecyclingThread ├── AgsReturnableThread ├── AgsSingleThread ├── AgsSoundcardThread ├── AgsTaskThread ╰── AgsTimestampThread

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The AgsThread base class. It supports organizing them within a tree, perform syncing and frequencies.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_lock ()
refsect2.para: Locks the threads own mutex and sets the appropriate flag.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_trylock ()
refsect2.para: Locks the threads own mutex if available and sets the appropriate flag and returning TRUE. Otherwise return FALSE without lock.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_unlock ()
refsect2.para: Unlocks the threads own mutex and unsets the appropriate flag.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the very first AgsThread within same tree level

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the very last AgsThread within same tree level

refsect2.title: ags_thread_parental_is_locked ()
refsect2.para: Check the AGS_THREAD_LOCKED flag in parental levels.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_sibling_is_locked ()
refsect2.para: Check the AGS_THREAD_LOCKED flag within sibling.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_children_is_locked ()
refsect2.para: Check the AGS_THREAD_LOCKED flag within children.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_next_parent_locked ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve next locked thread above thread .

entry.para: the parent AgsThread where to stop.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_next_sibling_locked ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve next locked thread neighbooring thread

refsect2.title: ags_thread_next_children_locked ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve next locked thread following thread

entry.para: the parent AgsThread where to stop.
the parent AgsThread where to stop.
the parent AgsThread where to stop.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_signal_parent ()
refsect2.para: Signals the tree in higher levels.

entry.para: whether to perforam a signal or to broadcast

refsect2.title: ags_thread_signal_sibling ()
refsect2.para: Signals the tree on same level.

entry.para: whether to perforam a signal or to broadcast

refsect2.title: ags_thread_signal_children ()
refsect2.para: Signals the tree in lower levels.

entry.para: whether to perforam a signal or to broadcast

refsect2.title: ags_thread_run ()
refsect2.para: Only for internal use of ags_thread_loop but you may want to set the your very own class function namely your thread's routine.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stop the threads loop by unsetting AGS_THREAD_RUNNING flag.

refsect2.title: ags_thread_new ()
refsect2.para:
Create a new AgsThread you may provide a gpointer as data
to your thread routine.

refsect2.title: The frequency property
refsect2.para: The frequency to run at in Hz.

refsect2.title: The frequency property
refsect2.para: The frequency to run at in Hz.

refsect2.title: The resume signal
refsect2.para: The ::resume signal is invoked during resuming.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run signal
refsect2.para: The ::run signal is invoked during run loop.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The start signal
refsect2.para: The ::start signal is invoked as thread started.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The stop signal
refsect2.para: The ::stop signal is invoked as thread stopped.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The suspend signal
refsect2.para: The ::suspend signal is invoked during suspending.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The timelock signal
refsect2.para: The ::timelock signal is invoked as standard compution time exceeded.
